chrome_extension_description.message: This extension allows to place bids via Rapidcatch.com auction sniper right at eBay, Delcampe, Allegro pages from your browser

request_status_not_activated_account.message: Account not activated! Use activation link from registration email first.

request_status_not_credential.message: No credentials for this auction. Please add them on Settings page.

request_status_not_premium.message: Only one bid per day allowed. Upgrade to a Premium plan for unlimited bidding.

request_status_not_multi.message: Unable to combine bids from different auction platforms with selected plan. Upgrade to Premium Multi plan.

request_status_invalid_item.message: Unknown item! Please check the URL.

request_status_invalid_platform.message: Unknown auction! Please check the URL.

request_status_cannot_bid_bin_only.message: Bidding on Buy It Now item is not possible.

request_status_listing_was_ended.message: Unable to place bid! Either bidding has already finished, or it is a shop item.
